about_the_game:
Set in a dystopian alternate history, "Index: Purger" is a dynamic, fast-paced first-person shooter where you play as an elite "Omega Security" mercenary, battling through intense, chaotic combat scenarios. With an expansive array of equipment and perks, you can create your own unique approach to the chaos and dominate your enemies. When not on the job, step into the lively cityscape, undertaking a range of quests and immersing yourself in the worldbuilding of Index-0. Experience this unique shooter adventure and become the ultimate mercenary!

  • Start from The Get-Inn Mall Defense mission and hop into bloody rabbit hole of the corporate military conflict with M.Inc.

  • Various firearms and weaponry, such as assault-rifles, pistols, PDW's, shotguns, sniper rifles and more.

  • Various enemy units with their own skills and logic, such as M.Inc. chemical units, electo-units, heavy units, or just bandits that you can find somewhere at the "Restricted Zone."

  • Mystery perk?

  • Citizen life with a freedom of your own choice. Would you like to just accomplish your citizen day fast or will you commit crimes?
  • Talk with characters and get a deeper understanding of the world of this game.

  • Interact with surrounding props, drop a chair on someone to make them fall on ground.



    Thanks to ostap_bender for throughout support of this game during early development period and for this Steam page as well.

    The game is still in development. Features and screenshots listed here are subject to change.

short_description: Step into the world of Index-0, and experience a thrill-fueled mercenary life like no other! With fast-paced, chaotic scenarios, you'll need to keep your wits about you to stay in the game. Make use of the equipment and perks at your disposal, and create your own unique style to control the chaos.
